name: GetLegalHoldPolicyAssignments
description:
Retrieve items assigned to a legal hold policy.

Use this tool to fetch all items that have been associated with a specific legal hold policy.

parameters.name: legal_hold_policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the legal hold policy to retrieve assignments for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the legal hold policy.

parameters.name: filter_by_assignment_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of item (e.g., file, folder, user, etc.) the policy was applied to. Choices: ['file', 'file_version', 'folder', 'user', 'ownership', 'interactions'].

value_schema.description:
Filters the results by the type of item the
policy was applied to.

parameters.name: filter_by_item_id
parameters.description: Filters results by the ID of the item the policy was applied to.

value_schema.description:
Filters the results by the ID of item the
policy was applied to.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: Specifies the position to start retrieving results using marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of items to retrieve per page for optimal pagination control.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: response_fields
parameters.description: List of attributes to include in the response, overriding standard fields unless specified.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: The ID of the legal hold policy.

value_schema.description: The ID of the legal hold policy.

parameters.name: assign_to_type
parameters.description:
Filters the results by the type of item the
policy was applied to.

value_schema.description:
Filters the results by the type of item the
policy was applied to.

parameters.name: assign_to_id
parameters.description:
Filters the results by the ID of item the

value_schema.description:
Filters the results by the ID of item the
policy was applied to.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the

not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
